titleStmt.title: The nosegay of morall philosophie lately dispersed amongst many Italian authours, and now newely and succinctly drawne together into questions and answers, and translated into Englishe by T.C. Seene and allowed.
Bouquet de philosophie morale. English
titleStmt.author: Meurier, Gabriel, d. 1587?
Crew, Thomas, fl. 1580.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the three Cranes in the Vintree by Thomas Dawson,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Meurier, Gabriel. Le bouquet de philosophie morale.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
